actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954 to require that, to the maximum extent practicable, private trade channels be used to carry out title II of such act.

summary.text: Requires that private channels be used, to the maximum extent possible, in international sales of agricultural commodities for foreign currencies and long-term-dollar credit under the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Trade Development and Assistance Act of 1954 to require that, to the maximum extent practicable, private trade channels be used to carry out title II of such act.
